params.chunk: - Next sequential content chunk Emits an {ChunkStored} event.
params.name: - Name given to the content. Eg: threejs.min.js_r148

params.details: - Any details the owner wishes to store about the content Emits an {ContentCreated} event.
params.name: - Name given to the content. Eg: threejs.min.js_r148

params.metadata: - metadata for EthFS V2 File Uses name as file name. Emits an {ContentSubmittedToFileStore} event.

params.fileName: - Name given to the File in FileStore
